mapper.select:
select * from ( select rownum productRecommand_num,data.* from( select product_id,product_subject,product_price,product_discount,product_resultPrice,product_like, product_firstSelect,product_secondSelect,product_lastSelect,product_mainSaveFileName from product order by product_recommand desc) data)
where productRecommand_num>=1 and productRecommand_num<=3

select * from ( select rownum rnum,data.* from ( select notice_id,notice_subject,to_char(notice_created,'YYYY-MM-DD') notice_created from notice order by notice_id desc) data)
where rnum>=1 and rnum<=5

select * from ( select rownum rnum, data.* from ( select * from product where product_secondSelect=#{product_secondSelect} order by product_saleCount desc) data)
where rnum>=1 and rnum<=4
select recipe_id, recipe_subject, recipe_select,recipe_mainSaveFileName,recipe_contentSaveFileName from recipe where recipe_id=(select nvl(count(*),0) from recipe)
select recipe_id, recipe_subject, recipe_select,recipe_mainSaveFileName,recipe_contentSaveFileName from recipe where recipe_id=(select nvl(count(*),0) from recipe)-1

select * from ( select rownum Num,data.* from( select * from product where product_firstselect='오!감동' order by product_id desc) data)
where Num<=4
